post.title: Another .NEAT Blogger
post.content: Another member of the .NET Enterprise Architecture Team, Ramkumar Kothandaraman (we just call him Ram), has started a blog. Like Simon, Ram spends most of his time with customers solving hard architecture issues. Check out his post on architectural agility.
post.excerpt: Another member of the .NET Enterprise Architecture Team, Ramkumar Kothandaraman (we just call him Ram), has started a blog. Like Simon, Ram spends most of his time with customers solving hard architecture issues. Check out his post on architectural agility.
